name: Frostbite (itch) (Mr Flappi)
description:
This is a very early prototype for a zombie survival game Frostbite

You will need to survive a zombie attack whilst gliding across an icy lake. The game restricts you to forwards movement meaning you must rely on momentum to get around.

Please note this game is a PROTOTYPE and it is not in a playable state. Also be aware that the game can take some time to get going as the map is very large.

CONTROLS:

W-Forward

LMB-Shoot

ESC-Exit

There currently is no health system so the game will continue forever until you quit

Please consider donating as it will allow me to develop/pay for higher-quality models for the games beta!
